line.en: And then... in the evening of that day.
'Well, I guess it's about time.'
'Yeah it is... ah, there it is!'
'Now for the local news.'
'This morning, local students succeeded in taking\npictures of an extremely rare cloud.'
'This is the picture they took.'
'Why aren't Ageha and Aoi in it?'
'After that...'
'This is so amazing.'

'This long, horizontal cloud is known as the
"Morning Glory", and while it's been known to
appear in Australia, it's appearance in Japan
comes as quite rare.'
'Enough with the explanation, show our kids\nalready!'
'Quiet mother!'
'This is an extremely valuable picture.'
'It's said that the students who took this\npicture flew on a glider that they made\nthemselves.'
'Also, the glider's pilot is disabled and\nnormally has to get around in a wheel chair.'
'I guess that's Kotori. What a lovely child. Oh,\nand there's Aoi in the back! Look! That's\ndefinitely Aoi!'

'No matter how you see it, he's one handsome guy
that'll make a great husband someday. I'm looking
forward to that day. I wonder if he'll marry
right after graduating?'
'I told you to be quiet mom!'
'... I still haven't given up hope yet.'
... The hot summer began to cool and a new school\nterm began.
'I saw the news! How does it feel to be a big TV\ncelebrity, Habane?'
'You're a famous member of the Soaring Club!'
'Oh... thanks.'
'What? Is something wrong?'
'What can I say... I guess I'm a bit burned\nout... I feel kind of sluggish...'
'Ah hah.'
'And... I just feel as if the life's been sucked\nout of me...'
'... It's those guys.'
'Heeey! Long time no see! I saw the news!'
'The Soaring Club sure is something!'
'Nah, it's nothing special really.'
'I saw Himegi on the news too!'
'It was nothing, don't mention it.'
'So, I heard you and Minase are close.'
'Ugh, you're one lucky son of a bitch, Aoi!'
'Nah, ahaha.'
'Well, I guess that means I've got a boyfriend.\nThank you!'
'Hey hey, don't say that so loud!'
'Whatever, you know you like it.'
'... This is too sweet. I think I'm getting a\nheartburn.'
'You look great together. Maybe I'll try to find\na boyfriend too.'
'The Soaring Club has flying practice every\nSaturday! Anybody interested should check it out!\nWe're always looking for new members!'
'... A firecracker as always.'
'What did you call me!? But yeah! No shortage of\nenergy here!'
'Oh, this is just the beginning! We're going to\nbe flying for a long time! Listen up, everyone!\nThe sky is wonderful!'
'How about that gap in level of enthusiasm?'
'It's nothing. It's just that he has a new goal,\nthat's all.'
'Right Ageha... so when is it going to be?'
'Here we go again...'
'What are you talking about?'
'Just listen to this. No matter how long I wait,\nshe refuses to tell me that she likes me.'
'At this point, I feel like saying it would mean\nadmitting defeat.'
'... Eh!? Does that mean you're still not going\nto say it?'
'Ridiculous! You have to at least give him that!'
'Ooo... Ageha...'
'You're always watching her. It's all you do.'
'Am I supposed to just sit by and watch as\nsomeone takes my daughter away?'
'At least it's Aoi and not some weirdo.'
'This glider was improved thanks to the help of\neveryone in the Keifuu Academy...'
'Oh... this! This!'
'It's like a scene from a movie.'
'It's way too late to be showing something this\ngreat on TV!'
'It'll blow you all away!'
'Ageha! Say it!'
'I'll say it when the world only has one day\nleft.'
'No, now! Say it right now!'
'...Aoi, I li...'
'Licked a toad when I was younger. I felt really\nweird afterward.'
'Argh! How cruel can you be!'
'Hehehe. You're cute when you make that face.'
'So, don't say that. L and I and K!!'
'L- Lithium and I- Iodine, K- Kalium and E-\nEthanol...like the periodic table'
'Sigh! At least I can say it. You know, that I\nlove you. I can say it anytime and anywhere...!'
'Ahaha! We'll be together forever!'
'Give me a break you two!!'
